default.headline: Work at the Speed of Thought
default.subheadline: The First Self-Governing AI Operating Layer
default.body:
Move from "Stateless Prediction" to Universal Active Inference. WorkspaceOS combines Universal Vision with a Causal World Model to give agents the context they need—and the Governance you trust.

We reject the idea that AI is just a chatbot; instead, we model work as a Teleological System—an Omniverse of entities, actions, and constraints. By grounding agents in a persistent Causal Graph, we enable true System 2 reasoning. This architecture allows our Agent Parliament to mathematically resolve conflicts and guarantee safety before execution.

dev.headline: Your Self-Governing Engineering Partner
dev.subheadline: The active partner that refactors your code while you sleep. Governed by the Agent Parliament.
dev.body: WorkspaceOS is not just a copilot; it is a Partner that respects production safety. Using Universal Active InferenceContinuous observation of your git/terminal workflows to compile reusable automation primitives., it turns manual toil into managed assets. It utilizes system idle time to spin up Shadow EnvironmentsInvisible branches for running risky refactors or documentation passes without touching your working tree., running exhaustive tests in the background. It builds a **Hybrid Causal Graph** (Screen + API) for perfect context, all governed by an internal **Agent Parliament** that debates and verifies every commit before it's proposed.

ai.headline: The Universal World Model for AI
ai.subheadline: WorkspaceOS unifies your AI agents into a single Causal Graph that shares context across every tool.
ai.body: Your AI tools are islands—Claude doesn't know what Copilot wrote, and ChatGPT can't see your Cursor sessions. WorkspaceOS creates a **Persistent Causal World Model** across all interactions. When you debug with Copilot, your ChatGPT sessions inherit that context. When Claude writes documentation, it references the graph built in Cursor. Through **Universal Vision**, every agent shares the same ground truth. One 'System 2' reasoning loop continues across all tools, with patterns cached permanently in the graph.

vision.headline: Computing That Compiles Your Intent
vision.subheadline: WorkspaceOS transforms repeated workflows into permanent computational primitives (Entities, Actions, Constraints).
vision.body: Every workflow you repeat becomes a first-class object in the **Omniverse**. Like files and processes in traditional computing, your patterns become permanent, shareable **Teleological Primitives**. The first time you handle a payment error by checking logs, updating the dashboard, and notifying ops—that pattern is captured as a reusable **Action**. Next time, it executes instantly under the supervision of the **Agent Parliament**. Through universal screen-level awareness, these patterns work across any application, becoming the new assembly language of knowledge work.
